attributes.action: ask the RSPCA to drop their Freedom Food Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that the RSPCA drop their Freedom Food scheme as it has failed to protect the animals / livestock under it. The RSPCA should be there to protect all animals and not farm them for food. 

The RSPCA Freedom Food scheme has been exposed for cruelty, lack of care and has completely failed to protect the animals under it. It simply can’t be trusted anymore. 

It states the Freedom Food scheme is monitored by the RSPCA, yet the RSPCA admits itself farms are only monitored once every 15 months. This is simply not good enough. 

The RSPCA can’t be very proud of the scheme as they keep the farms under it a secret. They even refuse to tell their own members and committee. 

The scheme is doing more harm that good to the RSPCA and they know it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
